pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.11: Nuns’ relinquishment 13 to 30 are respectively identical to the monks’ relinquishment: 1, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:0.5); 2, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np2:0.5); 3, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:0.5); 6, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np6:0.5); 7, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np7:0.5); 8, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np8:0.5); 9, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np9:0.5); 10, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:0.5); 18, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:0.5); 19, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:0.5); 20, [](li-tv-bu-vb-np20:0.5); 22, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:0.5); 23, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np23:0.5); 25, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np25:0.5); 26, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np26:0.5); 27, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:0.5); 28, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:0.5); 30, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:0.5); with appropriate gender changes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.12.0: At this point the Pali reads _(Dutiya) Pattavagga_ to indicate the last chapter of _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the nuns. This indication is redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on _nissaggiys pācittiya_ rules for the _bhikkhus_.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.13.0: At this point the Pali reads _Pariṇatasikkhāpada_ to indicate the last rule in the chapter of _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the nuns. This indication is redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules immediately below, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the _bhikkhus_.
